column4: hello guys when I type in my browser localhost I get it works! but I wonder where that page is allocated so I could install more pages in that directory does anybody know?
If not there, try the htdocs subdirectory of your apache installation dir.
I wonder what's wrong because Im installign Drupal but I can't see it from localhost
I see the it works! page but I can't see the drupal pages
you've copied the drupal files to wherever your webpages are (htdocs or /var/www)?
yeah, I will find out though, do you know how can I acces phpmyadmin though?
oh... :( try copying the phpmyadmin directory to /var/www or htdocs and trying again
Always glad to help fellow ubuntu users!
thanks very kind person, I always have trouble hehe everyday I come up with a question
